name: TRAPPER 950
notes: The prototype was the 1/2 ton 'Roller Coaster', that helped put Rob Humphries on the map as a designer of successful racing Yachts. The first production version was the MISTRAL 31, built by Fiarey Allday Ltd. (UK). Trapper Yachts aquired the molds and the 950 was the result. Only a handful were built. Most came with cast iron ballast. A few 'GP' models were built with more exotic materials.
